reviewText: Came as promised. Was ordering an extra for my parents. :)
Well suited for youth. A lot of corny humor, but enjoyed it good ideas on honesty and behavior.
This movie is a family favorite!  It's funny but also teaches some great values.  Our children have enjoyed it at all ages.  A little corny, of course, but very good.

This has got to be one of the most quoted DVD in our house! It is a sweet tale of an honest man and how it gets him into trouble and also gets him out. Your littlest child to your grandparent will love the sweetness and crazy characture of each person. Some have said its corny acting but somehow it never really seamed that way to us. Besides I like corn on the cobb anyway. :)

From what I saw of the movie, I thought it was a little silly.  The main guy in the story is always bumbling things as he pinches every penny saving up to be able to marry his love.  The story line was not really to my liking but to be fair in my review, I was not able to watch the entire movie as the DVD was faulty and I had to return it for a refund (which I received promptly).
Engaging, Fun, Clean, and Moral. My family continues to enjoy it. It is just one of the many available dvds from Feature Films for Family. We recommend them all!

I didn't hesitate in purchasing this DVD. I have one other film from this company.

This movie is a funny moments,but, it has a very important message. the questions on the back cover is a great chance for families to talk over the movie content.

I highly recommend this film company to every family.
